settings.title: Logistic Regression
settings.description: Risk Prediction with Logistic Regression. The first patient set is supposed to be our set which we want to predict our target for. The second is our model patient set
settings.resultDescription: This Scriplet computes the probabilities that a target concept occurs for a given patient set

input.name: Target concept
input.description: Drag and drop a concept on the field

input.name: Model year
input.description: Year from which our model data should be taken

input.name: Model target interval
input.description: Year from which our model data should be taken

input.name: Prediction year
input.description: Year for which our target should be predicted
